# Settlement of ETH
This document presents the recommended steps in order to settle the Nahmii 1
balance of NII of account `0xEb3D804E8308168Ef272E5874D2f00cd0ef71A60`.

The ordered steps of contract function invocations are included below and in
the corresponding [steps.json](./steps.json). Please read [the general recipe
for settling Nahmii 1 balance](../../README.md) before starting on the first
step of settlement.

## Ordered steps
### Step 1
#### Contract
*DriipSettlementChallengeByPayment* ([0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a](https://etherscan.io/address/0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a))
#### Method name
*startChallengeFromPayment*
#### Method payload
```

```
#### Encode method args
* *payment*: 
```
{
  "seals": {
    "wallet": {
      "hash": "0xadc4016d1c827f7f64bb1b9a443c09b0e3644906623f11c024e8734d49215eef",
      "signature": {
        "s": "0x4cd5b2d8eef78b1aca80c492721a9645b52e3582331a399e8b7bda3ca8dbeefa",
        "r": "0x1f46423dfb333189584690baa87c084aa6f9c10990a8090aeb8fe025e4aef4e7",
        "v": 28

      "hash": "0x1934a35fc489e874745b5843f067f30e2ed83a56b37e0c717d2c68235ae260dd",

        "r": "0xff0e06efffeb629b1f9cd7c3e4600441c1bd120ba2d7a6e688550a6dcb4e58ca",
```

### Step 2
#### Contract
*DriipSettlementByPayment* ([0xd2600fd59786b44c4869066018870aa33417f8f2](https://etherscan.io/address/0xd2600fd59786b44c4869066018870aa33417f8f2))

*settlePayment*
#### Method payload
```

```

### Step 3
#### Contract

*withdraw*
#### Method payload
```

```
